name: Images Generation
description: Create platform-ready promotional images by iterating on prompts, documenting every GenID, and saving final assets.

tasks.task_name: Generate initial images for social networks

responsibilities.name: Generate product image
responsibilities.details: Input a detailed prompt that produces a hero illustration of the product with the name spanning the full width.

responsibilities.name: Visualize process post
responsibilities.details: Prompt for a post-style graphic that illustrates key responsibilities and the working process.

responsibilities.name: Design tool icons
responsibilities.details: Generate icons representing the tools used in production (match the quantity of responsibilities mentioned).

checklist.name: Adjust prompt accuracy
checklist.details: Tweak prompts until outputs match the brief for contrast, freshness, and CTR goals.

checklist.name: Save prompt ids
checklist.details: Store the final prompts and GenIDs in the prompt database for traceability.

tasks.reporting: Capture the final assets plus prompt references in the campaign report.

responsibilities.name: Reuse chat context
responsibilities.details: Continue in the same conversation so the model keeps prior context.

responsibilities.name: Refine prompt copy
responsibilities.details: Iterate on the wording until the blog graphics meet quality standards.

responsibilities.name: Record prompt ids
responsibilities.details: Document the final prompt and GenID in the shared database.
